With Aries Framework JavaScript 0.4 released, the community is already hard at work on the next release. Currently in development are:
- DIDComm v2
- OpenID4VP and SIOPv2 for proving credentials
- DIDComm Bluetooth Transport for React Native for offline communication

Why are digital identity standards important?

Although you lose a lot of privacy and anti-correlation features of AnonCreds, the simplicity in implementing OpenID4VC and W3C Credentials is big, and sufficient in most VC use cases being worked on.

With self-sovereign identity you can issue, manage & verify verifiable credentials in simple steps and securely

Keep private data #decentralized and secure.

5. Support for signing and verification of W3C JWT credentials in addition to JSON-LD credentials. JWT credentials offer a simple way to encode a credential into a JSON Web Token.
